column5: Crankbait were the order of the day, then Drop Shotting Slammers & Twitch for a while & as we tried to force the Top water bite to work it never & we went back to Crankbaits again, KVD & XPS Tight Lines SBK
What are slammers, I drop shot 4" finesse worms. Would love to try something new. Plus does drop shotting generally only work on bass, I get catfish on it but only with live minnows.
Topwater was the ticket lastnight, got a dozen in just over an hour..  My mom actually landed one that was pushing 4-5lbs!  Fun way to fish...
We've caught Browns & Rainbows on them also, good for almost anything Tight Lines SBK   Slammers
